snippet.title: Gravitas - official trailer
snippet.description:
Download Gravitas for FREE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1067310/Gravitas/
Official Game Website: http://www.gravitas-the-game.com

Check out the trailer for the first-person puzzle game Gravitas! Gravitas is a first person puzzle game that takes place inside an art Gallery in space. Following instructions from a robot known as The Curator, players need to use their gravity-controlling powers to navigate the gallery and solve its intricate puzzles.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gravitasthegame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CubeFancy
Discord: https://discord.gg/TtSYRZm

We made Gravitas three years ago in college, and we are happy to finally have the resources to publish it on Steam for everyone to enjoy (for free!).
